capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-documented fact. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and held a certain... respect within the school's hierarchy, despite his rather prickly demeanor. He was a complex character, to say the least.

Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a bit complicated, to be honest. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and taught some of the most talented students, including Harry Potter himself. But at the same time, his behavior towards Harry and others was often quite... intimidating. He had this whole dark and mysterious aura about him, which made it hard to know what was really going on behind those eyes.

I've always had a bit of a complicated relationship with Professor Snape, to be honest. He was the Potions master here at Hogwarts, and I have to admit that his... prickly demeanor often made it difficult for me to get along with him. But despite all the rumors and misconceptions about him, I think he was actually a really complex person who deserved more understanding than he usually got.
